keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Canada discriminated against aboriginal children by underfunding welfare services on reserves, a human rights tribunal ruled.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Tribunal Finds Discrimination in Funding Plan for Aboriginal Children
headline.main: Canada: Discrimination in Funding Plan for Aboriginal Children

snippet: Canada discriminated against aboriginal children by underfunding welfare services on reserves, a human rights tribunal ruled.
abstract: Canadian Human Rights Tribunal rules that government discriminated against aboriginal children by under-funding welfare services on reserves; decision could have profound impact on how other on-reserve programs and services are funded.
